_header: Come Maker of Ghost Thou art
Subjects: Holy Ghost, hymns to; hymns, to Holy Ghost

Bod425.First Lines:
CUm maker of gaste þou ertþouhtes of þine þou
                    sele and hert…
Bod425.Last Lines:
…Til vs þe sune he sende on hasteGiftes of þe holi
                    gaste
Bod425.Editions:
Heuser,  Wilhelm. 
             “Eine vergessene handscrift des Surteespsalters und die dort
                eingeschalteten mittelenglischen gedichte.” 
             Anglia
         29 (1906): 385-412: 409-10.
Brown,  Carleton Fairchild,
                        ed.  
             Religious Lyrics of the XIV Century.
         Oxford: Clarendon, 1924. 2nd ed., rev.: G. V. Smithers, Oxford,
            1952: 57-8.
